page.title: 16PLAYGROUND GAMES 1
page.content: In this area we play games like: Build Ups,T.V.Programmes,Hopping Red Rover, Semi-Circle Luz,Yellow Lines,Ladders, Fudge,Volley Ball,Off Guard Touch, Cannon and Bulldog.Build-Ups is a chasing game with one person chasing the other players.The person who is caught is the chaser in the next game. T.V.Programmes is a game that is very popular with first years.One person has to give clues to the others and they have to guess the name of the programme.Hopping Red Rover is played on a Netball Court.One is in the centre circle and has to knock over the people that come past him.The rules of the game demand that you hop. Semi-Circle Luz is also played on a Netball Court.There are teams in each semi-circle and they have to throw a ball to the other team.If the ball is caught it is a point to your team.
